original_text: And the children of Israel departed thence at that time, every man to his tribe and to his family, and they went out from thence every man to his inheritance.
korean_text: 그 때에 이스라엘 자손이 그 곳에서 각기 자기의 지파, 자기의 가족에게로 돌아갔으니 곧 각기 그 곳에서 나와서 자기의 기업으로 돌아갔더라

sentences.original_text: And the children of Israel departed thence at that time
every man to his tribe and to his family
sentences.korean_translation: 각 사람은 자기 지파와 자기 가족에게로 돌아가고

sentences.original_text: and they went out from thence
